Translations.Text: Mahima ghosana karo tomara sarbonnata prabhura namera
yini srsti karena, tarapara suthama karena
ara yini susamanjasa karena, tarapara patha dekhiye nena
ara yini trnalata ud‌gata karena
tarapara take sukiye pamsute baniye phelena.
Amara yathasighra tomake parabo, phale tumi bhulabe na
sudhu ya-kichu allah iccha karena ta byatita. Niscaya tini janena prakasya ebam ya gupta rayeche.
Ara amara tomara jan'ya sahaja kare deba sahajakaranera jan'ya.
Ata'eba tumi smarana kariye caloca niscaya smarana karanote suphala rayeche.
Ye bhaya kare se yathasatbara upadesa grahana karabe
kinta eti eriye calabe nehata duscaritra
ye birata agune dhoke parabe
Takhana se sekhane marabe na, ara bamcabe'o na.
Se-i yathartha saphalakama habe ye nijeke pabitra kareche
ebam tara prabhura nama smarana kare, ara namaya pare.
Na, tomara duniyara jibanake pradhan'ya da'o
athaca parakala'i besi bhala o dirghasthayi.
Nihsandeha e'isaba ache purbabarti dharmagranthe
ibrahima o musara dharmagranthe.
Tomara kache ki bihabalakara ghatanara sambada paumcheche
se'idina aneka mukha habe abanata
parisranta, abasadagrasta
prabesamana habe jbalanta agune
tadera pana karano habe phutanta phoyara theke.
Tadera jan'ya bisakta kamtagacha theke chara an'ya kono khadya thakabe na
tadera nadusanudusa banabe na ebam ksudha'o metabe na.
Se'idina aneka mukha habe santa
tadera pracestara jan'ya paritrpta
samucca udyane
sekhane tumi sunabe na kono baje katha.
Sekhane rayeche bahamana jharana
sekhane ache umcu sinhasana
ara panapatragulo hatera kache sthapita
ara takiyagulo sarisari sajano
ara galicasaba bichano.
Tara ki tabe bhebe dekhe na utera dike -- kemana kare take srsti kara hayeche
ara akasera dike -- kemana kare take tole rakha hayeche.
Ara pahara-parbatera dike -- kemana kare tadera sthapana kara hayeche
ara e'i prthibira dike -- kemana kare take prasarita kara hayeche
ata'eba upadesa diye calo, nihsandeha tumi to ekajana upadesta.
Tumi tadera upare adau adhyaksa na'o
kinta ye ke'u phire yaya o abisbasa posana kare
allah takhana take sasti debena kathinatama sastite.
Nihsandeha amadera kache'i tadera pratyabartana
atahpara amadera upare'i tadera hiseba-nikesera bhara.
Bhabo bhorabelara katha
ara dasa ratrira katha
ara jorera o bejorera katha
ara ratrira katha yakhana ta bigata haya.
Ete ki ne'i kono sapathabakya bodhasaktisampannadera jan'ya
tumi ki dekho ni tomara prabhu ki karechilena'ada bansera prati
Iramera prati yadera chila umcu gathana
yadera ksetre ogulora samatulya an'ya sahare tairi haya ni
ara chamuda-jatira prati, yara khola-prantare bisalakara pathara katato
ara phira'a'unera prati, yara chila durdharsa senadala
yara bidrohacarana karechila sahare-nagare
ara sekhane asanti bariye diyechila
se'ijan'ya tomara prabhu tadera upare henechilena sastira kasaghata.
Nihsandeha tomara prabhu to praharamance rayechena.
Sutaram manusera bela -- yakhana tara prabhu take pariksa karena, phale take sam'mana dena o take anugraha dana karena, takhana se bale -- ''amara prabhu amake sam'mana diyechena.’’
Ara yakhana tini take pariksa karena, phale tara prati tara jibanopakarana mepe-jokhe dena, takhana se bale -- ''amara prabhu amake hina karechena.’’
Na, bastuta tomara etimake sam'mana kara na
ara nihsbadera khabara dite parasparake utsahita kara na
ara tomara grasa kare phela uttaradhikara sbatba puropuri galadhahkarane
ara tomara dhanasampatti bhalabasa gabhira bhalabasaya.
Kakhana'i na! Yakhana prthibita bhenge curnabicurna haye yabe
ara tomara prabhu o phiris‌tagana asabena katare katare
ara se'idina tini jahannamake niye asabena; se'idina manusa smarana karabe, kinta e smarane tara ki kaja habe
se balabe -- ''haya amara aphasosa! Ami yadi agabaratama amara e'i jibanera jan'ya!’’
Kinta se'idina ke'u'i tamra sastira mato sasti dite parabe na
ara na parabe ke'u bamdhate tamra bamdhanera mato.
Ohe prasanta prana
tomara prabhura kache phire eso santasta haye, -- santosabhajana haye
tarapara prabesa karo amara bandadera dale
ara prabesa karo amara jannate.’’
